name: ma_format
sql:
(format) -> multiIf (
      format = 'W',
      'Windows Media Streaming',
      format = 'H',
      'Flash HD',
      format = 'F',
      'Flash Streaming',
      format = 'D',
      'Flash Dynamic',
      format = 'P',
      'Progressive Downloads',
      format = 'A',
      'Smooth Streaming',
      format = 'Z',
      'Adobe HTTP Streaming',
      format = 'L',
      'HTTP Live Streaming',
      format
)
